page.topic: Record List - Combo Box Table Lookup
page.description: The Record List - List Box tab of the Table Lookups form contains two list boxes.

section.title: Vendor Choices for Record List - Combo Box
section.description: The Field Properties Choices tab of the Record List - Combo Box displays the Vendor_Name field and stores the Vendor_No field from the Vendor table. The records are sorted alphabetically by Vendor_Name . The implementation is the same as Described in List Box Table Lookup.

section.title: Product Choices for Record List - Combo Box
section.description: The Field Properties Choices tab of the Record List - Combo Box displays the Product_Name field and stores the Product_No field from the Product table. The records are sorted alphabetically by Product_Name . The implementation is the same as Described in List Box Table Lookup.

section.title: Product Filter for Record List - Combo Box
section.description: In addition, the Product_Name records are limited to those where Product_Vendor_No field equals quote_vendor_no_op4 . A change in the Quote_Vendor_No_OP4 field triggers a refresh of the Product list. The implementation is the same as Described in List Box Table Lookup, except that the variable Quote_Vendor_No_OP3 changes to Quote_Vendor_No_OP4. The Table Lookups sample database can be downloaded.
